name: Rivalhost
overview:
The Absolute Best in DDoS Protection and DDoS Mitigation Services! Our mission is to offer incredible service and outstanding value. Reliability is at the core of our business and we aim to offer scalable solutions for corporate partners, small businesses, and individuals alike. This commitment to quality and reliability extends to every facet of our company - from our employees, to our partners, to our technology. At the end of the day though, our business is about people. We’ll never forget that.

People First – Support that’s 2nd to None We’re relentless in providing best-in-class support to our customers. Running a business requires hard work and dedication. Whether you’re in charge of a Fortune 500 or running a small business, you’ll receive personalized support from our dedicated team. The last thing you should have to worry about is your hosting. That’s our job.

Real Professional Hosting Our diverse range of web hosting options, apps and services ensures you get the hosting you need. There’s never a ‘one-size-fits-all’ approach to business. We offer scalable web hosting solutions, as well as, DDoS mitigation and protection that gives you an added layer of security and confidence.

Safe and Reliable Hosting Web hosting is what we do. We’ve excelled in the industry because of our commitment to our clients and have been recognized for our 99.99% uptime. Your website is safe with us.

Relentless Focus on Being the Best Technology changes fast. Business changes fast. Successful businesses not only understand this, they live up to it. We are constantly evolving and adapting to the technological landscape of the industry by investing in top-tier hardware and datacenters. We partner with the best to deliver the best.
